Row.Text: Pronounced tectonics with rift valleys and convergent orogeny belts shaping the continents. Plate‑aware ocean separation widens gaps between bands; ruggedized coasts and islands remain lane‑safe. Climate and corridors align with plate/wind axes for a cohesive yet varied world.
